title: Polo Sport Ralph Lauren Leather Hiking Boots Brown Tan Strap Lug Sole Men 13D
hook: Chunky, rugged Polo Sport by Ralph Lauren leather boots with an instep strap and trail-ready lug sole—built for outdoorsy vibes and streetwear fits.
description:
Iconic Polo Sport styling in a tough, two-tone leather build: tan/brown leather panels, lace-up front, and a secure instep strap stamped POLO SPORT.

Finished with a grippy lug rubber outsole and rubber toe bumper for a durable, stomp-around-anywhere look—perfect for gorpcore, Y2K, or casual workwear.

condition: Condition: Pre-owned. Light wear from normal use—minor leather creasing and small scuffs; soles show light use. No box. Please review photos for details.

shipping_estimate_sentence: Estimated shipping is about $20 via USPS Priority (boots are heavier/bulky).
time_to_sell_sentence: Expected time to sell: ~1–3 months (size 13 can take a bit longer to find the right buyer).
